explanation.rules:
Rules:
• Number prefixes = l‑V‑vut‑ (people, singular), l‑V‑ven‑ (otherwise, singular); xan‑ ‘many’; u‑ ‘dual’ (V = the vowel of the next syllable).
• Size prefix pat‑ = ‘big’.
• Quantifier prefixes bung‑ = ‘group’, kon‑ = ‘part’.
• Before another prefix, le‑ven‑ → len‑.
• Assimilation: ‑n‑ → m before p; ‑n‑ → ng before k.
• Lenition: ‑p / p‑ → v.
• Between two vowels: ‑t / t‑ → r; ‑k / k‑ → x.
rule_checklist: Number prefixes = l‑V‑vut‑ (people, singular), l‑V‑ven‑ (otherwise, singular); xan‑ ‘many’; u‑ ‘dual’ (V = the vowel of the next syllable).
Assimilation: ‑n‑ → m before p; ‑n‑ → ng before k.
Between two vowels: ‑t / t‑ → r; ‑k / k‑ → x.
